title: Christmas Panther Style
description: Their world was turned upside down...  With booms, kabooms, and bullets flying after a mad dash across continents on a rescue mission in a plane painted like Santa's sleigh.  Join some friends old and new as they chase the enemy none of them ever wanted. One of their own.Â   Find out who is on the Naughty List this year, in Christmas Panther Style  Christmas Panther Style is part of the Delta Force - Team Panther Series. While it can be read as a standalone... To ensure maximum enjoyment, it is best read in series order.  This title was previously published in January 2019
author: Annabella Stone
